encyclopedia.content: Russia 名词 n. 1. 俄罗斯 俄罗斯联邦（俄语：Российская Федерация,Russian Federation）简称俄罗斯（Russia）是世界上国土面积最大的国家，面积达1700多万平方千米。首都莫斯科，国土大部分在亚洲，首都莫斯科在欧洲境内，所以属于欧洲国家。 2. 苏俄 加州-洛杉矶县 ... 纽西兰(New Zealand) 苏俄(Russia) 其他地区(Other) ... 3. 俄罗斯联邦 俄罗斯联邦(Russia) 亚洲(Asia) 4. 俄国 russia 名词 n. 1. 俄罗

means.word_mean: 1. a former communist country in eastern Europe and northern Asia; established in 1922; included Russia and 14 other soviet socialist republics (Ukraine and Byelorussia an others); officially dissolved 31 December 1991
2. formerly the largest Soviet Socialist Republic in the USSR occupying eastern Europe and northern Asia

3. a former empire in eastern Europe and northern Asia created in the 14th century with Moscow as the capital; powerful in 17-18th centuries under Peter the Great and Catherine the Great when Saint Petersburg was the capital; overthrown by revolution in 19
4. a federation in northeastern Europe and northern Asia; formerly Soviet Russia; since 1991 an independent state
